snippet.title: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, PC)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ disgaea.us/d7 

The demonic realm of Hinomoto has fallen under a tyrannical regime, and it is up to the lazy warrior Fuji and bushido fangirl Pirilika to fight back while discovering the meaning of honor and redemption! 

Embark on an epic SRPG adventure stuffed to the brim with new features including Jumbification, Hell Mode, Item Reincarnation, new and improved auto-battle, and online ranked battles! You can even customize your own team with a robust roster of over 40 character classes!

Coming Fall 2023 to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and PC!

#Disgaea7
#Disgaea
